actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to modify the project for the Fort Peck Dam, Montana, to require the construction and maintenance of a rock breakwater.

summary.text: Modifies the Fort Peck Dam project in Montana to authorize the Secretary of the Army, through the Chief of Engineers, to construct and maintain a rock breakwater on Fort Peck Lake. Stipulates that the Federal Government shall pay all of the costs of such breakwater.

titles.title: A bill to modify the project for the Fort Peck Dam, Montana, to require the construction and maintenance of a rock breakwater.
